title: Does anybody know the Madden/EA Sports font?
content:
It has a curved E, and, except for that, looks surprisingly like the Impact font. Does anybody know? Guesses are acceptable.

Here's the link: [http://static.gamecrazy.com/images/games/boxart/12397.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315143130/http:/static.gamecrazy.com/images/games/boxart/12397.jpg)  
The font's on all of the game's titles except for NASCAR, and in big letters on the box.
author: jgrfanatic

comments.content: Don't say Aurora Bold Condensed, though. That was on the old EA Sports Games.

Looks kind of like Steile Futura / Tasse. I think this has come up before though.

- Lex

[http://www.typophile.com/node/29528](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315143130/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29528 "http://www.typophile.com/node/29528")

Stefan thinks that it is custom.

- Lex

The font named EA Sans, You can find it here:  
 [http://hohodigidea.deviantart.com/art/EA-Sans-90020473](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315143130/http:/hohodigidea.deviantart.com/art/EA-Sans-90020473 "http://hohodigidea.deviantart.com/art/EA-Sans-90020473")
